Title: War Altar of Sigmar
Intro: A War Altar of Sigmar is armed with Light of Banishment.

Rules.Name: Arch Lector
Rules.Rule: ARCH LECTOR: This model is commanded by an 1 Arch Lector armed with 1 of the following weapon options: Sigmarite Greathammer; or Sigmarite Warhammer and Staff of Sigmar.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Warhorses are armed with Steel-shod Hooves.

Rules.Name: Devotional Horn
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Once per battle, at the start of the battleshock phase, you can say that this model will blow its Devotional Horn. If you do so, enemy units within 10" of this model cannot issue or receive commands in that phase.

Rules.Name: Light Of Banishment
Rules.Rule: Light of Banishment: Add 1 to the damage inflicted by each successful attack made with Light of Banishment that targets a DAEMON unit.

Rules.Name: Sigmar’s Shield
Rules.Rule: Friendly DEVOTED OF SIGMAR units that are wholly within range of this unit’s Sigmar’s Shield ability, as shown on the damage table above, have a ward of 6+.
